name: CbcSolver
brief: Top-level driver class for standalone CBC solver

algorithms.name:
Command-Line Driver with Scripting Support
Copyright (C) 2007, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

CbcSolver wraps CbcModel with command-line parsing and scripting:
- solve(): Execute command sequence (argc/argv interface)
- fillParameters(): Centralized parameter initialization
- Supports CbcUser callbacks for extensibility
- Supports CbcStopNow for termination control

Note: This class is designed to wrap CbcMain0/CbcMain1 functionality.
For direct API usage, prefer CbcModel directly.

see: CbcModel for the core B&C solver
